columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.name: The name of the player.
columns.Position: The playing position of the player.
columns.Club_ID: The identifier for the club to which the player belongs.
columns.Apps: The total number of appearances made by the player.
columns.Tries: The total number of tries scored by the player.
columns.Goals: The total number of goals scored by the player.
columns.Points: The total points accumulated by the player.

player.table_description: The table tracks player statistics in a sports competition.

columns.Competition_ID: The unique identifier for each competition.
columns.Year: The year in which the competition takes place.
columns.Competition_type: The type of competition, such as tournament or friendly.

competition.table_description: The table lists details of various sports competitions.

columns.Competition_ID: The unique identifier for the competition.
columns.Club_ID_1: The identifier for the first club participating.
columns.Club_ID_2: The identifier for the second club participating.
columns.Score: The final score of the competition between the clubs.

competition_result.table_description: The table records results of competitions between clubs.

columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club.
columns.name: The name of the club.
columns.Region: The geographical region where the club is located.
columns.Start_year: The year when the club was established.

club.table_description: The table lists clubs participating in various sports competitions.

columns.Rank: The rank of the club based on performance.
columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club.
columns.Gold: The total number of gold medals won by the club.
columns.Silver: The total number of silver medals won by the club.
columns.Bronze: The total number of bronze medals won by the club.
columns.Total: The total number of medals won by the club.

club_rank.table_description: The table summarizes the ranking and medal achievements of clubs.
